system.Text:
When __you rest and recover for several hours in the wild__, roll +supply.

On a __strong hit__, you and your allies may each choose two. On a __weak hit__, choose one.

  * Recuperate: Take +1 health for you and any companions.
  * Partake: Suffer -1 supply and take +1 health for you and any companions.
  * Relax: Take +1 spirit.
  * Focus: Take +1 momentum.
  * Prepare: When you break camp, add +1 if you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.ac19f4c7f3fe31be]{Undertake a Journey}.

On a __miss__, you take no comfort. @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.c10d64f58dd8c5bf]{Pay the Price}.

Trigger.Text: When you rest and recover for several hours in the wild...

Strong Hit.Text:
On a __strong hit__, you and your allies may each choose two.

  * Recuperate: Take +1 health for you and any companions.
  * Partake: Suffer -1 supply and take +1 health for you and any companions.
  * Relax: Take +1 spirit.
  * Focus: Take +1 momentum.
  * Prepare: When you break camp, add +1 if you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.ac19f4c7f3fe31be]{Undertake a Journey}.

Weak Hit.Text:
On a __weak hit__, you and your allies may each choose one.

  * Recuperate: Take +1 health for you and any companions.
  * Partake: Suffer -1 supply and take +1 health for you and any companions.
  * Relax: Take +1 spirit.
  * Focus: Take +1 momentum.
  * Prepare: When you break camp, add +1 if you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.ac19f4c7f3fe31be]{Undertake a Journey}.

Miss.Text: On a __miss__, you take no comfort. @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.ironswornmoves.c10d64f58dd8c5bf]{Pay the Price}.
